entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:00 AM PST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 03:50 AM PST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of rain early in the afternoon and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
